@OffTopicJP However, it has a social meaning in that it allows us to experiment with various economic and governance policies. Economies and governance policies that work well in the digital world may be introduced in the real world, for example in urban planning.
@OffTopicJP Why Web3 is interestingThere is always the risk of inflation, and the problems are getting more and more complex.

@OffTopicJP How to set up a DAO?
„ÉªFirst of all, the following elements are necessary: rules, some kind of commitment to have the rules followed, and monitoring to see if the rules are being followed.The purpose, values, and process of the DAO (how to do it) are essential.

@OffTopicJP DAO itself is in the verification phase.
„ÉªRight now, we are in the experimental stage to see what kind of structure DAO can function. There are many problems such as lack of tools and human resources.

@OffTopicJP 2. Similar to nation building
„ÉªThe land is the initial product of Web3. The land is the initial Web3 product. The rules and institutions (government) in the land are the DAO, the movement of money in the country is the token, and the product is the NFT.

#93 @OffTopicJP Web3 governance and economy
important things
It‚Äôs not about building a company. It‚Äôs important to think about how to provide ownership and upside to users. It is important to think about how to provide users with ownership and upside.
